title: PES ECE VS RVITM CSE
content:
i got rvitm cse in mock allotment and PES ECE through pessat . which one would be a better option ?i would go with PES anyday but im getting core cse and thats the reason giving it second thoughts.  
seniors please guide...

comments.body: Depends what branch you interested in
Bro if you are getting pes go for it ece is good and you can learn coding and other cse related topics to land a cse job in pesu
